last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Danny and Milo are eventually reunited, but only so that they can face their show trial together. And, believing they would never meet again, each has blamed the other for their so-called crimes.

name: Tripped
overview: Danny is an average 24-year-old who has been friends with stoner Milo since they were kids. But then Danny decides it’s time to grow up, settle down and marry long-term girlfriend Kate, whereas Milo continues to focus on getting high. One night Milo takes a particularly strong batch of hallucinogens, and Danny appears in his living room - except the real Danny’s at his engagement party, and the real Danny doesn’t normally carry a sword! This Danny claims to come from another dimension, and he brings a warning - the only problem is that Milo’s too wrecked to remember what it is...

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Milo is horrified to discover at his best friend Danny's engagement party, that he has been overlooked as his best man.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Danny and Milo land in a world where Milo was a rock star who lived fast and died young.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The stakes are raised when Danny and Milo land in a world on the brink of war with no means of escape.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Danny and Milo are eventually reunited, but only so that they can face their show trial together. And, believing they would never meet again, each has blamed the other for their so-called crimes.
